colorTheory.description: The color palette is inspired by a professional resume/CV, aiming for a harmonious and sophisticated look.
colorTheory.mood: The colors convey professionalism, trustworthiness, and modernity.
colorTheory.accessibility: High contrast text against the light background ensures readability, following WCAG AA guidelines.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary color (#00A99D) represents a modern and bold choice, complemented by the secondary color (#333333) for clear differentiation. The accent color (#FFD700) adds vibrancy and draws attention where needed.
